name: WeatherAPI.com
description: WeatherAPI.com is a powerful fully managed free weather and geolocation API provider that provides extensive APIs that range from the weather forecast, historical weather, future weather, weather alerts, air quality data, IP lookup, and astronomy through to sports, time zone, and geolocation.

api_methods.name: Realtime Weather API
api_methods.description: Current weather or realtime weather API method allows a user to get up to date current weather information in json and xml. The data is returned as a Current Object.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:  Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508 city name e.g.: q=Paris US zip e.g.: q=10001 UK postcode e.g: q=SW1 Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

utterances.utterance: What's the current weather in New York City?
Can you give me the real-time weather update for the postal code 90210?
What's the weather like right now in Paris?
Show me the current weather conditions for the coordinates 34.0522,-118.2437.
What's the current weather at Heathrow Airport?
Give me the real-time weather for the UK postcode SW1A 1AA.
What's the current weather in Toronto using the postal code M5H 2N2?
Can you provide the current weather for the IP address 192.168.1.1?
What's the weather like right now at the METAR station EGLL?
Show me the current weather using my IP address.

api_methods.name: Forecast Weather API
api_methods.description: Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days of forecast required.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

utterances.utterance: What's the weather forecast for the next 5 days in New York?
Can you give me the weather forecast for Paris for the next 3 days?
What's the weather like in Tokyo today?
I need the weather forecast for the next 7 days in Los Angeles.
What's the weather forecast for London in French?
Can you tell me the weather forecast for the next 10 days in Sydney?
What's the weather forecast for the next 2 days in Berlin?
I need the weather forecast for the next 14 days in Miami.
What's the weather like in Dubai on October 15th?
Can you provide the weather forecast for the next 4 days in Toronto?

api_methods.name: Time Zone API
api_methods.description: Time Zone API method allows a user to get up to date time zone and local time information in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

utterances.utterance: What's the current local time in Paris?
Can you tell me the time zone for the coordinates 48.8567,2.3508?
What is the local time in New York City using the zip code 10001?
Find the current time zone for the UK postcode SW1.
What's the time zone for the Canadian postal code G2J?
Get the local time for the airport with IATA code DXB.
What is the current time at the location with METAR code EGLL?
Can you provide the local time based on my IP address?
What's the time zone for the IP address 100.0.0.1?
Tell me the current time in Tokyo.

api_methods.name: Future Weather API
api_methods.description: Future weather API method returns weather in a 3 hourly interval in future for a date between 14 days and 300 days from today in the future.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: 'dt' should be between 14 days and 300 days from today in the future in yyyy-MM-dd format (i.e. dt=2023-01-01)

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

utterances.utterance: What will the weather be like in Paris on 2024-03-15?
Can you give me the weather forecast for New York City on 2024-05-10?
I need the weather prediction for Tokyo on 2024-07-20.
What's the weather forecast for the area with postal code G2J on 2024-09-01?
Tell me the weather in London on 2024-11-25.
How's the weather going to be in Berlin on 2024-12-05?
What is the weather forecast for Los Angeles on 2024-08-15?
Can you provide the weather details for Sydney on 2024-10-10?
I want to know the weather in Dubai on 2024-06-30.
What's the weather forecast for the location with zip code 10001 on 2024-04-20?

api_methods.name: Sports API
api_methods.description: Sports API method allows a user to get listing of all upcoming sports events for football, cricket and golf in json.

utterances.utterance: What are the upcoming sports events in New York?
Can you list the sports events happening in Tokyo soon?
Show me the upcoming football matches in Madrid.
What sports events are scheduled in Sydney this week?
Find the upcoming cricket matches in Mumbai.
Are there any golf tournaments happening in Los Angeles soon?
List the sports events in Paris for the next month.
What are the upcoming sports events in Berlin?
Can you tell me about the sports events in Dubai this weekend?
Show me the list of upcoming sports events in Rio de Janeiro.

api_methods.name: History Weather API
api_methods.description: History weather API method returns historical weather for a date on or after 1st Jan, 2010 (depending upon subscription level) as json.

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: For history API 'dt' should be on or after 1st Jan, 2010 in yyyy-MM-dd format

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: Restricting history output to a specific hour in a given day.

parameters.name: end_dt
parameters.description: Restrict date output for History API method. Should be on or after 1st Jan, 2010. Make sure end_dt is equal to or greater than 'dt'.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

utterances.utterance: What was the weather like in New York on March 15, 2022?
Can you provide the historical weather data for Paris on July 4, 2019?
I need the weather history for Los Angeles on January 10, 2021.
What was the weather in Tokyo on December 25, 2020?
Show me the weather conditions in London on August 1, 2018.
Get the historical weather for Miami on June 15, 2017.
What was the weather like in Sydney on November 11, 2016?
Can you tell me the weather history for Berlin on April 20, 2015?
I need to know the weather in Rome on February 14, 2014.
What was the weather in Toronto on September 30, 2013?

api_methods.name: IP Lookup API
api_methods.description: IP Lookup API method allows a user to get up to date information for an IP address in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
e.g: q=auto:ip

IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

I need information about the IP address 8.8.8.8.
What is the geolocation data for the IP 172.16.254.1?
Please look up the IP address 203.0.113.0 for me.
Find the location information for the IP 10.0.0.1.
Can you tell me the details of the IP address 192.0.2.1?
I want to know the geolocation for the IP 198.51.100.0.
Please provide the information for the IP address 127.0.0.1.
What are the details for the IP 255.255.255.255?
Can you look up the IP address 192.88.99.0 and give me the details?

api_methods.name: Astronomy API
api_methods.description: Astronomy API method allows a user to get up to date information for sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset, moon phase and illumination in json.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

city name e.g.: q=Paris

auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1
